it.polito.verifoo.random

Class RandomTopology

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.verifoo.random.RandomTopology

  • public class RandomTopology
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a random topology for Verifoo ("Hosts" element and "Connections" element)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomTopology(java.util.Random random, RandomGraph graphs, int maxHosts)
      Creates a totally random generated physical topology for Verifoo

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomTopology

        public RandomTopology(java.util.Random random,
                      RandomGraph graphs,
                      int maxHosts)
        Creates a totally random generated physical topology for Verifoo
        Parameters:
        random - a random number generator
        graphs - a RandomGraph object describing the service graph
        maxHosts - the maximum number of hosts on the topology

    • Method Detail
